txt.en: 'Mail? Were you not here when the army rode forth? I have a few suits to spare, but I would not sell them to my worst enemy, much less my countrymen.\n\n'Nevertheless, if they are determined, you can pick them up from the ground there.'
Ulf is in Edoras.\n\nYou should bring the armour you collected to Ulf at once.
Ulf has been tasked with ensuring the Riders' armour and weapons are in good repair.
'This is the best the smith could offer? It will have to do. You have my thanks, such as it is.'
The smith is in Edoras.\n\nUlf asked you to seek out the local smith and learn if he has any mail to spare for the Riders Four.
The armour the smith spoke of is on the ground near him.\n\nYou should collect the armour the smith spoke of.
Bring the armour you collected to Ulf
'Was this all that you could find?'

'[placeholder], I am seeing to the care of our arms, but our armour is damaged, and I have not the skill to patch it. Would you seek out the local smith and see if the army left any mail behind which we might use?'
